Volume Render¶

Volume Render
class dexp.volumerender.volumerender.VolumeRenderer(size=None, interpolation='linear')[source]¶

renders a data volume by ray casting/max projection

usage:

rend = VolumeRenderer((400,400)) rend.set_data(d) rend.set_units(1.,1.,2.) rend.set_modelView(rotMatX(.7))
